name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-content-block
title: Content Block
shortDescription: A dynamic SharePoint Framework web part for displaying content in flexible two-panel layouts with rich text editing, drag-and-drop reordering, and SharePoint image uploads.
longDescription: A dynamic SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part that displays content in a flexible two-panel layout with comprehensive rich text editing capabilities. Features include drag-and-drop reordering with @dnd-kit, active/inactive content management for visibility control, direct image uploads to SharePoint SiteAssets, and three configurable layouts (50/50, 75/25, 25/75). The custom rich text editor provides full HTML formatting, table insertion, image management with SharePoint integration, source code editing mode, and content sanitization for security. Perfect for creating engaging content sections, feature comparisons, or structured information displays on SharePoint pages.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
